description: [Lokibot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0447) has tricked recipients into enabling malicious macros by getting victims to click "enable content" in email attachments.(Citation: TrendMicro Msiexec Feb 2018)(Citation: Talos Lokibot Jan 2021)

external_references.description: Co, M. and Sison, G. (2018, February 8). Attack Using Windows Installer msiexec.exe leads to LokiBot. Retrieved April 18, 2019.
Muhammad, I., Unterbrink, H.. (2021, January 6). A Deep Dive into Lokibot Infection Chain. Retrieved August 31, 2021.
